name: Mug
desc: A cup used for drinking hot beverages such as coffee or tea.

name: Coffee Maker
desc: A kitchen appliance used to brew coffee.

name: Blender
desc: A kitchen appliance used to blend ingredients or puree food.

name: Juicer
desc: A kitchen appliance used to extract juice from fruits and vegetables.

name: Air Fryer
desc: A kitchen appliance for frying food using hot air.

name: Toaster
desc: A toaster is a small kitchen appliance used to toast slices of bread, bagels, or other baked goods.
